Looking for a comprehensive, hands-on guide to SHAP and Shapley values?
[Interpreting Machine Learning Models with SHAP](https://leanpub.com/shap) has you covered.
With practical Python examples using the shap package, you'll learn how to explain models ranging from simple to complex.
It dives deep into the mechanics of SHAP, provides interpretation templates, and highlights key limitations, giving you the insights you need to apply SHAP confidently and effectively.
